headline: Should Ford's (F) Big Bet on F-Series Truck Expansion Prompt Investor Action?
summary: In the past week, Ford Motor Company reported a US$50.53 billion third-quarter revenue and announced plans to boost F-Series truck production and create up to 1,000 new jobs, while also affirming its regular dividend and managing several large-scale recalls. Ford is prioritizing its most profitable gas and hybrid trucks, pausing F-150 Lightning EV assembly and transferring employees, as supply chain challenges and demand trends drive operational adjustments. We'll examine how Ford's decision...
